location.sjis: ルイーズ村 住宅地

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: こんなカビくさい村を出て 大きな町に行きたいわ ああ〜でも村の掟が
portrait_l.ascii: I want to leave this musty village and go to a big town. Ahh~ but the village laws

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ギャラハンさんは、いい人なんだけどね あれ以来、ちょっと近寄りがたいよ まあ、しょうがないけどね
portrait_l.ascii: Mr. Gallahan is a good person, but ever since THAT happened, he's been hard to approach. Well, that's to be expected.
